basics.name: Ashish Thomas Mathew
basics.summary: A highly skilled, Indian-born, Data Science student with a keen interest in Artificial Intelligence, robotics and everything computer science.

work.name: TATA Consultancy Services
work.summary: A highly motivated software developer who successfully developed AI-driven solutions to tackle complex problems in computer vision, object detection and Natural Language Processing.
highlights: Developed and maintained fully-featured single-page applications in Angular and Django for a fintech client.
Prepared comprehensive reports and real-time visualizations to communicate findings to the research team and stakeholders.
Built and deployed CI/CD pipelines for rapid application test and deployment processes, improving the deployment speed by 80%.
Ensured robustness of developed systems by troubleshooting and debugging complex technical issues.
Provided technical support for clients, assisting with resolving software issues via phone, email and live chat.

volunteer.summary: Lead organizer for events in the city to help address some of the world's pressing challenges on a smaller scale through the UNs sustainable goals.

education.institution: University of Massachusetts Dartmouth, Dartmouth, MA.

projects.name: Multithreaded Implementation of Floyd-Steinberg Dithering
projects.summary: Implemented and studied the performance of the Floyd-Steinberg Dithering Algorithm with multithreading to study its performance in comparison to its single threaded implementation.
